code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function GameForm(_ref){let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[gameDetails,setGameDetails]=useState({managerName:'',scheduledDateTime:'',admission:'',description:'',availableSlots:0});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setGameDetails(prevDetails=>({...prevDetails,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit(gameDetails);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"game-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create a New Pickup Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"managerName",children:"Manager's Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"managerName",name:"managerName",value:gameDetails.managerName,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"scheduledDateTime",children:"Scheduled Date/Time:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"datetime-local",id:"scheduledDateTime",name:"scheduledDateTime",value:gameDetails.scheduledDateTime,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"admission",children:"Admission:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"admission",name:"admission",value:gameDetails.admission,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"description",children:"Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"description",name:"description",value:gameDetails.description,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"availableSlots",children:"Available Slots:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"availableSlots",name:"availableSlots",value:gameDetails.availableSlots,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});}export default GameForm;
